required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Outcome and Fusion Results Using the VerteLoc® Facet Fixation Device
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Single Arm Clinical Trial Evaluating Clinical Outcome and Fusion Results Using the VerteLoc® Facet Fixation Device

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this clinical study is to evaluate fusion of the facet joints in a prospective cohort of patients utilizing the VerteLoc facet fixation device in patients receiving lumbar laminectomy (L1-S1), without ancillary stabilization devices such as pedicle and transfacet screws.

primary_outcome.measure: Fusion grade at 12 month follow-up using CT scans

secondary_outcome.description: Subject success / Clinical outcome: Evaluate the reduction in baseline VAS back pain score.
